DOC.brief_summary: This single-centre , comparative , prospective randomise trial . It include 70 patient period 2 year randomize two group 35 patient : one group patient treat osteosynthesis ( plate , nail screw ) second group treat total hip replacement . The Harris PMA functional score assess 6 week , 3 month , 6 month 1 year . The time recovery weight-bearing , subjective satisfaction score , EQ5D quality life questionnaire , VAS score pain rest walking , Parker score , rate complication death also measure . Operating time , blood loss scar size also evaluate .
